titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: LAPAROTOMY FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS INDICATION CODE - Description

div.p: LAPAROTOMY FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS INDICATION CODE is the same as attribute LAPAROTOMY FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS INDICATION CODE.

For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, LAPAROTOMY FOR NECROTISING ENTEROCOLITIS INDICATION CODE is reported when the PATIENT requires a laparotomy based on the result of an Abdominal X-Ray.
